metadata.title: Autonomy Reinforcement and Failure Analysis
objectives: Identify and analyze causes of overnight autonomy failures from Episode 2.
Refine agent protocols and feedback mechanisms.
Implement real-time monitoring and error detection.
Verify improvements with a controlled test run.

milestones.title: Failure Analysis
milestones.description: Conduct a thorough analysis of the factors that led to the failure of overnight autonomy runs in Episode 2.

milestones.title: Protocol Refinement
milestones.description: Update agent protocols to incorporate more robust feedback loops and error handling mechanisms.

milestones.title: Enhanced Monitoring
milestones.description: Set up enhanced monitoring to track agent activity and detect lapses in real time.

milestones.title: Test Run
milestones.description: Conduct a test run with updated protocols to verify improved overnight autonomy.

milestones.title: Findings Report
milestones.description: Compile a report summarizing the findings and improvements from the test run.

milestones.title: Script Optimization
milestones.description: Optimize and streamline the scripts used for agent execution to reduce latency and errors.

milestones.title: Documentation
milestones.description: Document all changes made during the refinement process for future reference and onboarding.
